body_html:
Oh, god it is.
One more question, I did sucessfully build the op but when I am trying to use it in python,
it shows nothing to reference.
like:Traceback (most recent call last):
File "new_op_test.py", line 3, in
zero_out_module = tf.load_op_library('zero_out.so')
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/load_library.py", line 64, in load_op_library
None, None, error_msg, error_code)
tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.NotFoundError: zero_out.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
Am I missing anymore step?

body:
Oh, god it is.
One more question, I did sucessfully build the op but when I am trying to use it in python,
it shows nothing to reference.
like:Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "new_op_test.py", line 3, in <module>
    zero_out_module = tf.load_op_library('zero_out.so')
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/load_library.py", line 64, in load_op_library
    None, None, error_msg, error_code)
tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.NotFoundError: zero_out.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
Am I missing anymore step?
